title: Thousands flee Syrian city Homs as rebels advance further
content: Homs is the next city south on the road from Aleppo to Damascus, which the rebels have vowed to reach.
summary: Homs is the next city south on the road from Aleppo to Damascus, which the rebels have vowed to reach.

title: Damascus and Assad now in Syrian rebels' sights
content: The sudden offensive could become the biggest threat to Syria's president in 13 years of civil war.

title: Romanian court annuls result of presidential election first round

content: The singer cannot be sued as an individual, a judge has ruled.
